reviewText: This was a real steal.  Four feature length moves for one low price.  Of course, I already have two of the movies but they are on VHS where as this is a DVD so it is a lot easier to use.  As always Jackie Chan is excellent in all of them.  In Twin Dragons, I really dislike Boomers friend Tyson, but the rest of the movie moves along fine.
Title: Miramax Jackie Chan Series: Operation Condor / Operation Condor 2: The Armour of the Gods / Dragon Lord / Twin Dragons

reviewText: the video was great it will bring hours of enjoyment for me in the future the dvd was great i love it
Title: Miramax Jackie Chan Series: Operation Condor / Operation Condor 2: The Armour of the Gods / Dragon Lord / Twin Dragons

reviewText: Great combo set for Jackie Chan fans, I personally bought this set simply for the first movie, Operation Condor but enjoyed watching them all. Operation Condor 2 was an also see but the others were not movies I would recommend spending hard earned dollars on... overall its a win-win deal since for the price of just one dvd you get all four!
Title: Miramax Jackie Chan Series: Operation Condor / Operation Condor 2: The Armour of the Gods / Dragon Lord / Twin Dragons

reviewText: It's actually a zero star. After I bought this, I researched and found that most Miramax movies like this one don't provide English subtitles. It's unfair to Deaf people like me. I have to pay more for movies one by one that provides the subtitles. *rme*
Title: Miramax Jackie Chan Series: Operation Condor / Operation Condor 2: The Armour of the Gods / Dragon Lord / Twin Dragons

reviewText: Had 2 of these n VHS & love this man n action so I ordered it n DVD & got 2 other movies I had not seen so it worked out terrific.
Title: Miramax Jackie Chan Series: Operation Condor / Operation Condor 2: The Armour of the Gods / Dragon Lord / Twin Dragons
